data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 2, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Bruno Pacheco is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 4, Bruno Pacheco is back on the pitch.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 6, Ceara's Cleber Bomfim goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Bahia's Alesson is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 12, Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 14, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Ceara throw-in in Bahia's half.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 16, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 19, Bahia to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Attention is being given to Cearaâ€™s Cleber Bomfim and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 23, Ceara's Cleber Bomfim is back in action after a slight knock.
Gabriel Novaes is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 24, Gabriel Novaes for Bahia is back on the field again.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 26, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Bahia a goal kick.
Bahia's Rodriguinho gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vinicius Goes (Ceara) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 30, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Ceara just outside Bahia's area.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Rodriguinho (Bahia) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Bahia.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 34, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 36, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Bahia throw-in in Ceara's half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Bahia a goal kick.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Ceara's area.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
Ceara's Leo Chu misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 43, Edson (Bahia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Bahia are pushing forward but Matheus Bahia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick Ceara.
Ceara attack but Tiago's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Douglas Friedrich is back on his feet again.
In the minute 45, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Douglas Friedrich for Bahia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Mano Menezes (Bahia) has taken off Douglas Friedrich who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Anderson is the replacement.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Ceara.
Throw-in high up the field for Ceara in Salvador.
Elias is replacing Edson for the home team.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 49, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Bahia.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 50, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Elias for Bahia has been booked by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Ceara drives forward and Vinicius Goes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 52, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Bahia throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 53, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Vinicius Goes for Ceara drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima blows against Ceara's Vinicius Lima for offside.
Rodriguinho's header is off-target for Bahia.
In the minute 57, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Ceara a goal kick.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Ceara.
In Salvador, Vinicius Goes of Ceara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 59, Free kick Bahia.
Daniel is on a sub for Rodriguinho for Bahia.
Bahia make their fourth substitution with Gilberto replacing Gabriel Novaes.
In the minute 61, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 64, Bahia are coming forward and Gilberto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
The away team replace Leo Chu with Saulo.
Free kick Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 67, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fessin.
Fessin for Bahia is back on the field again.
In the minute 70, Bahia needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
Mano Menezes (Bahia) is making a fifth change, with Rossi replacing the possibly injured Fessin.
Ceara's Saulo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 72, Bahia to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Throw-in Bahia.
Ceara make their second substitution with Pedro Naressi replacing Fabinho.
The away team replace Cleber Bomfim with Leandro Carvalho.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 73, Tiago (Ceara) has received a yellow card from Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara drive upfield and Saulo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara take a 0-1 lead thanks to Vinicius Goes.
In the minute 82, Pedro Naressi instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Wescley replacing Vinicius Lima.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Vinicius Goes with Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca. This is the fifth substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 89, Bahia pushes forward through Nino Paraiba, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Salvador.
Wescley of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Bahia have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 7 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Ceara throw-in in Bahia's half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Saulo extends Ceara's lead to 0-2.
Wescley with an assist there.
